capabilities.name: create_or_update_file
capabilities.description: Create or update a single file in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: search_repositories
capabilities.description: Search for GitHub repositories

capabilities.name: create_repository
capabilities.description: Create a new GitHub repository in your account

capabilities.name: get_file_contents
capabilities.description: Get the contents of a file or directory from a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: push_files
capabilities.description: Push multiple files to a GitHub repository in a single commit

capabilities.name: create_issue
capabilities.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: create_pull_request
capabilities.description: Create a new pull request in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: fork_repository
capabilities.description: Fork a GitHub repository to your account or specified organization

capabilities.name: create_branch
capabilities.description: Create a new branch in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: list_commits
capabilities.description: Get list of commits of a branch in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: list_issues
capabilities.description: List issues in a GitHub repository with filtering options: milestone string (If an integer is passed, it should refer to a milestone by its number field. If the string * is passed, issues with any milestone are accepted. If the string none is passed, issues without milestones are returned.) ,state string(Indicates the state of the issues to return.Default: open - Can be one of: open, closed, all) ,assignee string  (Can be the name of a user. Pass in none for issues with no assigned user, and * for issues assigned to any user.) ,type string (Can be the name of an issue type. If the string * is passed, issues with any type are accepted. If the string none is passed, issues without type are returned.) ,creator string (The user that created the issue.) ,mentioned string (A user that's mentioned in the issue.) ,labels (An array of label names.)

capabilities.name: update_issue
capabilities.description: Update an existing issue in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: add_issue_comment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to an existing issue

capabilities.name: search_code
capabilities.description: Search for code across GitHub repositories

capabilities.name: search_issues
capabilities.description: Search for issues and pull requests across GitHub repositories

capabilities.name: search_users
capabilities.description: Search for users on GitHub

capabilities.name: get_issue
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: get_pull_request
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific pull request

capabilities.name: list_pull_requests
capabilities.description: List and filter repository pull requests

capabilities.name: create_pull_request_review
capabilities.description: Create a review on a pull request

capabilities.name: merge_pull_request
capabilities.description: Merge a pull request

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_files
capabilities.description: Get the list of files changed in a pull request

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_status
capabilities.description: Get the combined status of all status checks for a pull request

capabilities.name: update_pull_request_branch
capabilities.description: Update a pull request branch with the latest changes from the base branch

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_comments
capabilities.description: Get the review comments on a pull request

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_reviews
capabilities.description: Get the reviews on a pull request

capabilities.name: list_sub_issues
capabilities.description: List sub issues of an issue

capabilities.name: reprioritize_sub_issue
capabilities.description: Reprioritize a sub issue of an issue, make sure to specify either after_id or before_id, not both

capabilities.name: remove_sub_issue
capabilities.description: Remove a sub issue of an issue, sub_issue_id is the id of the issue to be removed not the issue number

capabilities.name: add_sub_issue
capabilities.description: Add a sub issue to an issue, sub_issue_id is the id of the issue to be added as sub-issue not the issue number

capabilities.name: list_labels_for_issue
capabilities.description: List all labels for an issue

capabilities.name: add_labels_to_issue
capabilities.description: Adds labels to an issue

capabilities.name: set_labels_for_issue
capabilities.description: Sets the labels for an issue, replacing any existing labels

capabilities.name: remove_label_from_issue
capabilities.description: Remove a label from an issue

capabilities.name: remove_all_labels_from_issue
capabilities.description: Remove all labels from an issue

capabilities.name: list_labels_for_repo
capabilities.description: List all labels for a repository

capabilities.name: create_label
capabilities.description: Create a label for a repository

capabilities.name: get_label
capabilities.description: Get a single label for a repository

capabilities.name: update_label
capabilities.description: Update an existing label for a repository

capabilities.name: delete_label
capabilities.description: Delete a label from a repository

capabilities.name: list_labels_for_milestone
capabilities.description: List labels for issues in a milestone

capabilities.name: list_milestones
capabilities.description: List milestones for a repository

capabilities.name: create_milestone
capabilities.description: Create a milestone for a repository

capabilities.name: get_milestone
capabilities.description: Get a single milestone for a repository

capabilities.name: update_milestone
capabilities.description: Update an existing milestone for a repository

capabilities.name: delete_milestone
capabilities.description: Delete a milestone from a repository
